subject: Mathematics

overview.description: Foundational mathematics curriculum for gifted students, emphasizing rigorous mathematical reasoning, advanced problem-solving techniques, and mathematical foundations that support advanced studies in Higher Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Computing

learning_objectives: Master fundamental mathematical concepts with deeper analytical understanding
Develop advanced mathematical reasoning and proof techniques
Apply mathematical modeling to complex real-world problems
Build strong foundation for Higher Mathematics and scientific disciplines
Prepare for mathematical olympiads and competitive examinations
Integrate mathematical thinking across STEM disciplines

units.title: Advanced Algebraic Structures and Functions
learning_outcomes: Master polynomial operations and factorization techniques
Understand function composition and inverse functions
Apply algebraic manipulation to solve complex equations
Develop skills in mathematical proof for algebraic concepts
Model real-world phenomena using algebraic functions

lessons.title: Advanced Polynomial Functions and Complex Factorization
objectives: Factor complex polynomials using advanced techniques
Understand polynomial division and remainder theorem
Apply polynomial functions to model real-world scenarios

activities.description: Explore polynomial behavior through graphical analysis and pattern recognition
Solve challenging polynomial equations using multiple methods
Model engineering and physics problems using polynomial functions
Construct formal proofs for polynomial theorems

resources: Graphing calculators and computer algebra systems
Advanced algebra textbooks and problem collections
cross_curricular_connections: Physics: Modeling motion and wave functions
Higher Mathematics: Preparation for abstract algebra

units.title: Advanced Coordinate Geometry and Analytical Methods
learning_outcomes: Master coordinate geometry in two and three dimensions
Apply vector methods to geometric problems
Understand conic sections and their properties
Develop spatial reasoning and visualization skills
Connect geometry to algebraic representations

lessons.title: Vector Geometry and Spatial Analysis
objectives: Apply vector operations to solve geometric problems
Solve problems involving lines and planes in space

activities.description: Visualize and manipulate 3D geometric objects using technology

Apply vector geometry to engineering and physics problems

cross_curricular_connections: Physics: Force vectors and motion analysis
